import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import CurrentWeatherStyles from "./CurrentWeatherStyles"; export default function WeeklyWeather({ weatherDetails }) { const [clicked, setClicked] = useState(null); const toggle = i => { if (clicked === i){ return setClicked(null) } setClicked(i) } console.log(weatherDetails) return (
{/* {weatherDetails && <> } */}

{Math.round(weatherDetails.current.temp - 273)}

{weatherDetails.daily[0].clouds}

{weatherDetails.daily[1].clouds}

{weatherDetails.daily[0].weather[0].main}

{weatherDetails.daily[0].weather[0].description}

{dailyArray.map((item, i) => (
toggle(i) }>

{convertDate(item.dt)}

{item.temp.min.toFixed(0)}/{item.temp.max.toFixed(0)}°C

{clicked === i ? "-" : "+" }

Ochtend Middag Avond Nacht
Temp {item.temp.morn.toFixed(1)}°C {item.temp.day.toFixed(1)}°C {item.temp.eve.toFixed(1)}°C {item.temp.night.toFixed(1)}°C
))}
) }
